title: Enhancing Medical Practice Competencies: A Language Proficiency Improvement Project Using Online Video

context.prior_knowledge: Basic language proficiency and possession of job-related foundational knowledge
context.additional_context: Practical competency enhancement program for medical/nursing field practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can produce a 5-minute video presentation incorporating job-related technical terminology.
Learners can derive at least three language-use strategies per work scenario by analyzing video content.
Learners can revise and improve their language expression methods with over 80% accuracy through peer assessment.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
